amendment.description: An amendment numbered 24 printed in Part B of House Report 118-551 to prohibit funds authorized by this Act to be used to implement the Administration's Climate Change Executive Orders (EO 13990, EO 14008, Section 6 of EO 14013, EO 14030, EO 14057, EO 14082, EO 14096).
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits funds to be used to implement the Administration's climate change Executive Orders (EO 13990, EO 14008, Section 6 of EO 14013, EO 14030, EO 14057, EO 14082, and EO 4096).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 215 - 210 (Roll no. 256).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 215 - 210 (Roll no. 256).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
